title: GeoView GeoChart Plugin Config Schema
description: This Schema validator validates the GeoView GeoChart Plugin configuration.

suportedLanguages.description: ISO 639-1 code indicating the languages supported by the configuration file.

version.description: The schema version used to validate the configuration file. The schema should enumerate the list of versions accepted by this version of the viewer.

charts.description: The array of chart configurations. The actual chart objects are validated with 'schema-chart.json' at the moment
